detectors.description: Pragma version^0.5.5 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#381) is known to contain severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.5.5](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#L381) is known to contain severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#443-449):
	- (success) = recipient.call.value(amount)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#447)
Constant AaveRegistry.aETH (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#655) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES
Variable AaveRegistry._aTokenByToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#659) is too similar to AaveRegistry._tokenByAToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#658)

UniversalERC20.slitherConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#537-641) uses literals with too many digits:
	- ZERO_ADDRESS = IERC20(0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#542)
detectors.markdown:
[UniversalERC20.slitherConstructorConstantVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#L537-L641) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [ZERO_ADDRESS = IERC20(0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#L542)

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#61-63)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#87-90)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AaveRegistry.sol#96-98)
